page.description: This example shows how to use the Static Text O Directive. The {F} operator specifies font, size, and style. The {B} operator specifies background color. The {C} operator specifies foreground color. The {I} operator inserts an image.

section.description: Note how the (flag) check box sets the flag variable, which enables or disables the static text.
